department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Acquisition of Laser-Based Cutter/Engraver/Etcher (LBCEE) equipment for the Department of National Defence.
description: modification to closing time of 2022-09-23 at 2:00 PM EDT.    the department of national defence has a requirement for a laser based cutter/engraver/etcher (lbcee).  the lbcee will allow the capability to rapidly produce custom fabric products, mark high value items, and serialize controlled items.
